sense.def:
To be faithful to a person, organization, or idea
pomeni ostati trden v svoji podpori neki osebi, organizaciji ali ideji.

seg.quote: Bond remained faithful to his old teacher.
The party rallied round him faithfully.

sense.def:
To be faithful to one's husband, wife, or lover
pomeni ne imeti spolnih odnosov z nikomer, razen s svojim možem, ženo, ljubico ali ljubimcem.

seg.quote: She has been a faithful wife to him.

sense.def:
Pripoved, prevod ali priredba knjige, ki je
faithful
, natančno predstavlja dejstva v izvirniku.

seg.quote: Do you think the film was faithful to the book?
Their activities were faithfully described in the newspapers.
